title: About Me
text: My name is Pratham Kancherla and I am a sophomore at The Ohio State University. My major is Computer Science & Engineering and I am proficient in Python, Java, R, HTML.

title: About
text: My name is Pratham Kancherla and I am a sophomore at The Ohio State University. My major is Computer Science & Engineering and I am proficient in Python, Java, R, HTML.

title: About Me
text:
About My Project
This project will focus on analyzing each of the 5 positions in basketball, the PG (Point Guard), SG (Shooting Guard), SF (Small Forward), PF (Power Forward), C (Center), and finding the position with the best average FT%. The dataset I will be using can be found here.

title: NBA FT% at Each Position

title: Model
text:
Center Fitted Object


stan_glm
 family:       gaussian [identity]
 formula:      `FT%` ~ 1
 observations: 60
 predictors:   1
------
            Median MAD_SD
(Intercept) 0.7    0.0   

Auxiliary parameter(s):
      Median MAD_SD
sigma 0.1    0.0   

------
* For help interpreting the printed output see ?print.stanreg
* For info on the priors used see ?prior_summary.stanreg

stan_glm

------

title: Sources
text:
PG: https://www.fantasypros.com/nba/stats/avg-pg.php
SG: https://www.fantasypros.com/nba/stats/avg-sg.php
SF: https://www.fantasypros.com/nba/stats/avg-sf.php
PF: https://www.fantasypros.com/nba/stats/avg-pf.php
C: https://www.fantasypros.com/nba/stats/avg-c.php
When I had first gotten the data, I first selected the free throw attempted and free throws made columns. Next, I had to clean the data to eliminate outliers, which were players that did not attempt enough free throws. Next, I created a predicted estimated to create a fitted object and then used a histogram to visually represent the prediction. I have also displayed the median vertical line on the histogram.

title: Sources
text:
PG: https://www.fantasypros.com/nba/stats/avg-pg.php
SG: https://www.fantasypros.com/nba/stats/avg-sg.php
SF: https://www.fantasypros.com/nba/stats/avg-sf.php
PF: https://www.fantasypros.com/nba/stats/avg-pf.php
C: https://www.fantasypros.com/nba/stats/avg-c.php
When I had first gotten the data, I first selected the free throw attempted and free throws made columns. Next, I had to clean the data to eliminate outliers, which were players that did not attempt enough free throws. Next, I created a predicted estimated to create a fitted object and then used a histogram to visually represent the prediction. I have also displayed the median vertical line on the histogram.
